trans-unit.id: If you previously purchased Voice Recognition you do not need to purchase again. Press Cancel. Otherwise, Press the OK button to start the purchase process of %@. Press OK to display pricing and purchase confirmation.

trans-unit.id:
If you previously purchased Workspace using MyTalkTools Lite you do not need to purchase again. Press Cancel. Otherwise, Press the OK button to start the purchase process of Workspace. %@
Press OK to display pricing and purchase confirmation.
trans-unit.source:
Si vous avez déjà acheté Workspace en utilisant MyTalkTools Lite vous n'avez pas besoin de l'acheter à nouveau. Appuyez sur Annuler. Dans le cas contraire, appuyez sur le bouton OK pour commencer le processus d'achat de Workspace. %@
Appuyez sur OK pour afficher les prix et la confirmation d'achat.
trans-unit.note: If you previously purchased Workspace using MyTalkTools Lite you do not need to purchase again. Press Cancel. Otherwise, Press the OK button to start the purchase process of Workspace. %@ \n\nPress OK to display pricing and purchase confirmation.

trans-unit.id: The Lite version is limited to 20 cells. You are using %d cells and requested %d additional cells. You can use Board/Delete to remove cells, then Sync/Merge to release the space. Then try to add a board again.
trans-unit.source: The Lite version is limited to 20 cells. You are using %d cells and requested %d additional cells. You can use Board/Delete to remove cells, then Sync/Merge to release the space. Then try to add a board again.
trans-unit.target: הגרסה הדלה מוגבלת ל 20 תאים. הנך יכול למחוק לוח לפינוי תאים ואז לבצע סנכרון. לאחר מכן נסה להוסיף לוח זה שוב. %dמתוך %d

trans-unit.id: The Lite version is limited to 20 cells. You are using %ld cells and requested %ld additional cells. You can use Board/Delete to remove cells, then Sync/Merge to release the space. Then try to add a board again.
trans-unit.source: The Lite version is limited to 20 cells. You are using %ld cells and requested %ld additional cells. You can use Board/Delete to remove cells, then Sync/Merge to release the space. Then try to add a board again.

trans-unit.id: The Lite version is limited to 20 cells. You can use Board/Delete to remove cells, then Sync/Merge to release the space. Then try to add this board again.

trans-unit.target: הגרסה הדלה מוגבלת ל 20 תאים. הנך יכול למחוק לוח לפינוי תאים ואז לבצע סנכרון. לאחר מכן נסה להוסיף לוח זה שוב.
trans-unit.note: The Lite version is limited to 20 cells. You can use Board/Delete to remove cells, then Sync/Merge to release the space. Then try to add this board again.

trans-unit.id: The content on your iPhone has been sent to our new web authoring service. You may now login to www.mytalktools.com with your current username and password to author new content. Please contact customer support if you have any problems.
trans-unit.source: The content on your iPhone has been sent to our new web authoring service. You may now login to www.mytalktools.com with your current username and password to author new content. Please contact customer support if you have any problems.
trans-unit.target: התוכן של מכשיר האייפון נשלח לשירות העריכה באינטרנט החדש שלנו. הינך יכול להיכנס ל www.mytalktools.com עם שם המשתמש והסיסמא שלך, לערוך את התוכן החדש שלך. אנא צור קשר עם שירות הלקוחות לכל בעיה
trans-unit.note: The content on your iPhone has been sent to our new web authoring service. You may now login to www.mytalktools.com with your current username and password to author new content. Please contact customer support if you have any problems.

trans-unit.id: The required application has not be installed on this device.
trans-unit.source: The required application has not be installed on this device.
trans-unit.target: היישום הנדרש לא ניתן להתקין על המכשיר הזה.

trans-unit.id: The required application has not be installed or has not been authorized on this device.
trans-unit.source: The required application has not be installed or has not been authorized on this device.
trans-unit.target: The required application has not be installed or has not been authorized on this device.
trans-unit.note: The required application has not be installed or has not been authorized on this device.

trans-unit.id: This device is not configured for sending Email. Please configure the Mail settings in the Settings app.
trans-unit.source: This device is not configured for sending Email. Please configure the Mail settings in the Settings app.
trans-unit.target: מכשיר זה אינו מוגדר לשליחת דואר אלקטרוני. נא להגדיר את גדרות דואר ביישום ההגדרות.
trans-unit.note: InAppSettingsKit This device is not configured for sending Email. Please configure the Mail settings in the Settings app.

trans-unit.id: This is not the username and password you used the last time you logged in. If we had internet access we could check to see if it matches your username/password on the web. But we don’t have internet access right now. 1. Re-enter your username and password. 2. Check and reconnect your internet connection.
trans-unit.source: This is not the username and password you used the last time you logged in. If we had internet access we could check to see if it matches your username/password on the web. But we don’t have internet access right now. 1. Re-enter your username and password. 2. Check and reconnect your internet connection.
trans-unit.target: שם המשתמש או הסיסמא שונים מאלו שהשתמשת בפעם הקודמת. יש להכניס שם משתמש וסיסמא שונים או להתחבר לאינטרנט לצורך אימות הפרטים.
trans-unit.note: This is not the username and password you used the last time you logged in. If we had internet access we could check to see if it matches your username/password on the web. But we don’t have internet access right now. 1. Re-enter your username and password. 2. Check and reconnect your internet connection.

trans-unit.id: This will overwrite both your mobile device and your workspace.
trans-unit.source: This will overwrite both your mobile device and your workspace.
trans-unit.target: זו תחליף גם המכשיר הנייד שלך ואת סביבת העבודה שלך.
trans-unit.note: This will overwrite both your mobile device and your workspace.

trans-unit.id: This will put a copy of this cell and its child boards into a public library accessible to other users of MyTalkTools.
trans-unit.source: This will put a copy of this cell and its child boards into a public library accessible to other users of MyTalkTools.
trans-unit.target: This will put a copy of this cell and its child boards into a public library accessible to other users of MyTalkTools.
trans-unit.note: This will put a copy of this cell and its child boards into a public library accessible to other users of MyTalkTools.

trans-unit.id: To create your account you must have an internet connection to MyTalkTools. Please establish an internet connection and try again.
trans-unit.source: To create your account you must have an internet connection to MyTalkTools. Please establish an internet connection and try again.
